page.shortlink: api client api a5 u array dsv to method

argument.name: array
argument.description: The array of data to be converted.

argument.name: settings
argument.description: The settings to use when parsing the passed in string. If only the "value" separator needs to be specified a string with that character maybe used.

property.name: separator
property.description: The specification for what characters are used to separate values and rows. If only the "value" separator needs to be specified a string with that character maybe used.

property.name: value
property.description: The character to use for delimiting values. The default is ",".

property.name: row
property.description: The character to use delimiting rows. The default is a new line.

property.name: quote
property.description: The specification for what character is used to create a quoted value. If only the "value" of the quote character needs to be specified a string with that character maybe used. The "escape" character will be the same as the "value" character.

property.name: value
property.description: The character to use when creating a quoted value. The default is a quote (").

property.name: escape
property.description: The character to use for escaping the quote character by placing the escape character before the quote character. The default is a quote (").

property.name: convert
property.description: Rules for converting values in the passed in data to specific variable types.

property.name: number
property.description: An optional format to use when outputting numbers. See Number.toFormat.

property.name: nulls
property.description: The value to use for a null value in the data.

property.name: booleans
property.description: If an object is passed in, then the conversion of booleans will use the specified strings for true and false values.

property.name: truthy
property.description: The string to use in the output data for a true value.

property.name: falsey
property.description: The string to use in the output data for a false value.

page.description: Convert an array of data into string of delimiter-separated values.

discussion.p: The A5.u.array.dsv.to method can convert an array of data to one of the many delimiter-separated values formats. The names of columns in the data will always be assumed to be the first row of text.
